attributes.action: close our borders now and regain a british way of life
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: close our borders now until a british way of life is reastablished in this country and crime,housing,social services and health matters are back to normal.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence –
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/UKImmigration/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
